Name: Adrien Nicholas Brody

Born: April 14, 1973

City: Woodhaven, Queens, New York. US

Occupation: Actor, Producer, Artist

Height: 6‚Ä≤ 1‚Ä≥ (1,85 m)

Adrien Nicholas Brody was born in Woodhaven, Queens, New York. The only child of retired history professor and painter Elliot Brody and Hungarian-born photographer Sylvia Plachy. He accompanied his mother on assignments for the Village Voice, and credits her with making him feel comfortable in front of the camera.

In his childhood Adrien Brody performed magic shows at children‚Äôs birthday parties as ‚ÄúThe Amazing Adrien‚Äù. His parents enrolled him in acting classes to distract him from the dangerous people who might exist in the neighborhood where they lived.

The actor commented on his childhood and adolescence during the ceremony of the campaign Save the children 2015:

‚ÄúI‚Äôm a product of public schools. My father is a public school teacher‚Ä¶ Without his guidance, I wouldn‚Äôt be here today,‚Äù confessed the star and newly appointed Bulgari ambassador at a press conference preceding the party. ‚ÄúI wouldn‚Äôt have the confidence to speak my mind‚Ä¶ I would not have the strength to commit to the roles I have, to believe in myself in this business, which is a very competitive business.‚Äù

‚ÄúI grew up in a working class neighborhood,‚Äù he continued, captivating the room with his candidness about his modest Queens upbringing. ‚ÄúAnd I‚Äôve witnessed the effects of poverty and lack of education and lack of guidance, which falls under the same category, and (I saw) friends of mine who did not have the self-confidence at the end of the day and did not have the encouragement and who did not pursue those dreams.‚Äù

He attended the I.S. 145 Joseph Pulitzer middle school, The American Academy of Dramatic Arts and Fiorello H. LaGuardia High School for the Performing Arts in New York. After attended Stony Brook University before transferring to Queens College for a semester.

He received widespread recognition and acclaim after starring in Roman Polanski‚Äôs The Pianist (2002). He won the Academy Award for Best Actor at age 29, the only actor under 30. Brody is also the only male American actor to receive the French C√©sar Award.

The actor also has his own production company called Fable House.

¬ª Career

Taking acting classes at thirteen, he appeared in an Off-Broadway play and a PBS television film. Adrien Brody hovered on the brink of stardom, receiving an Independent Spirit Award nomination for his role in the 1998 film Restaurant and later praise for his roles in Spike Lee‚Äôs Summer of Sam and Terrence Malick‚Äôs The Thin Red Line. He received widespread recognition when he was cast as the lead in Roman Polanski‚Äôs The Pianist (2002). To prepare for the role, Brody withdrew for months, gave up his apartment and his car, broke up with his then-girlfriend, learned how to play Chopin on the piano, and lost 29 lbs (13 kg). The role won him an Academy Award for Best Actor, making him, at 29, the youngest actor ever to win the award, and to date the only winner under the age of 30. He also won a C√©sar Award for his performance. He pulled off a brilliant performance in The Pianist (2002), drawing on the heritage and rare dialect of his Polish grandmother, as well as his father, who lost family members during the Holocaust, and his mother, who fled Communist Hungary as a child during the 1956 uprising against the Soviet Union.

After The Pianist Brody appeared in different films. In Dummy (released in 2003 but originally shot in 2000, just prior to his work in The Pianist) he portrayed Steven Schoichet, a socially awkward aspiring ventriloquist in pursuit of a love interest (his employment counsellor). He learned ventriloquism and puppetry for the role (under the tutelage of actor/ventriloquist Alan Semok) convincingly enough to perform all of the voice stunts and puppet manipulation live on set in real time, with no subsequent post dubbing.

He played Noah Percy, a mentally disabled young man, in the film The Village, by M. Night Shyamalan, shell-shocked war veteran Jack Starks in The Jacket, writer Jack Driscoll in the 2005 King Kong remake, and father-to-be Peter Whitman in The Darjeeling Limited by Wes Anderson. King Kong was both a critical and box office success; it grossed $550 million worldwide and is Brody‚Äôs most successful film to date in monetary terms. Additionally, Brody played a detective in Hollywoodland.

-2008-

He played Bloom in The Brothers Bloom and Leonard Chess in Cadillac Records.

He has also appeared in Diet Coke and Schweppes commercials as well as Tori Amos‚Äô music video for ‚ÄúA Sorta Fairytale‚Äù.

-2009-

He starred in Splice, a science fiction film written and directed by Vincenzo Natali. Originally a Sundance film, Splice was adopted by Dark Castle Entertainment and distributed by Warner Bros.

Also played the star role of Royce in Predators (a sequel to the original Predator), directed by Nimr√≥d Antal and produced by Robert Rodriguez.

-2011-

Also Adrien Brody collaborated again with Wes Anderson in the Academy Award-winning The Grand Budapest Hotel, where he played the villain Dmitri. And starred American Heist movie.

-2015-

He starred as Tiberius with Jackie Chan in the film Dragon Blade by Daniel Lee, which grossed $54.8 million on the opening premiere week in China. The actor receive a trophy for Best Supporting Actor for his acting in Dragon Blade movie at the Huading Awards 2015 in China.

Also in 2015 he participate in the short films: Boredom, The library book, and The Mascot from JamesonFirstShot Site.

Directs the short film The Dodge Brothers, produces the documentary Stone Barn Castle as director, producer and composer. Also Adrien Brody starred some films including: Emperor (Not premiere yet), Backtrack, Septembers of Shiraz and more.

The actor received the ‚ÄòCinema Vanguard Award‚Äô in The Variety Night Of The Stars Tribute at the 2015 San Diego Film Festival on October 1, 2015 in San Diego California.

The film Emperor is finalized and completed, but has not been released until today due to problems with the production company. Adrien Brody plays Emperor Charles V.

-2016-

Adrien Brody starred Manhattan Nocturne by Brian DeCubellis, and appeared in a Dice (Tv Series) episode as himself.

For Christmas he starred Come Together: A Fashion Picture in Motion a 2016 Short Film by the Director Wes Anderson.

-2017-

The actor will participate in Bullet Head, Expiration, and the Tv serie ‚ÄòPeaky Blinders‚Äô Season 4 as the antagonist Luca Changretta.

-2018-

Presents his third work of art: ‚ÄúMetamorphosis: Transformations of the Soul‚Äù at the Art New York on May 4 ‚Äì 6, 2018.

Take part in the Epic Ride from amfAR on June, 2018 at the Life Ball in Vienna, Austria. The Life Ball is an annual charity event raising funds for HIV & AIDS projects.

It is the new image of the collection Autumn/Winter of MANGO.

He participates in various causes and charity events such as The Snow Leopard Foundation, amfAR and Unicef in which he donates a painting made by himself.

Begins his participation in the Netflix movie Blonde as Arthur Miller, one of Marilyn Monroe‚Äôs husbands. Release date: 2021.

The film Clean opens at the Tribeca Film Festival in April 2020 with a little audience due to the Cov19 pandemic.

¬ª Art Work

Adrien Brody debuted with his first Art Series of pop art paintings titled ‚ÄúHot Dogs, Hamburgers, and Handguns‚Äù at Lulu Laboratorium during the The Art Basel Miami Beach 2015. The pop-up show, which opens December 2, 2015 organized by Spanish-American artist and Brody‚Äôs friend, Domingo Zapata. (details here.).

¬ª Personal life

Adrien Brody is accessible but also a bit reserved. He is a person without vices and is rarely involved in celebrity scandals.

He is generally friendly to the press and his fans.

When he travels or attends events, he often goes with his parents.

Brody is a lover of art, nature and dogs. Helps various foundations. He currently has a dog named ‚Äúchicken‚Äù, to choose that name he asked fans for suggestions on Instagram.

He doesn‚Äôt use social media much. Instagram is the one he uses the most. He occasionally posts a photo of himself or his pets, while on twitter he rarely writes. The actor does not like to expose his day to day on social networks like other celebrities, so he uses them little and with caution.

The actor had a long relationship with the Russian model, Lara Leito from approximately 2013 to 2018. According to the international press and close friends of those involved, the actor is currently in a relationship since mid-2019 with the fashion designer Georgina Chapman.

The actor currently lives in Los Angeles, California.
